website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Z305 is an unobtrusive solution if you're sick of the tinny, enclosed sound from your laptop speakers but don't have room for a five-piece PC speaker set. We recommend this plug-and-play external audio device for its simplicity of operation, low cost, and convenience for use on the run.
pros: Easy setup with USB plug-and-play access
textured sound quality relative to price and size
cons: small clip won't fit over thicker displays

customer_reviews.title: great sound, while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were just as great as the reviews said they were, for the first few months. Then they would start to cut out and now they no longer work. They worked well for the first two months. The next couple months they would work some days and not others. The last month they have not worked AT ALL. I only purchased them just over six months ago. Now I am shopping for new speakers. Do not waste your money on these. Also, when I bought them on June 24th they were $44.99. Now they are above $100. Ridiculous markup for something that will not last. Please save yourself money and frustration and let me live vicariously through you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Over 5 years and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for over 5 years now and it is still working fine, I'm on my 3rd laptop since then and continue to use this speaker. It is much better than the normal speakers that most laptops have. The only problem is you can't use it for smaller laptops as the screens aren't strong enough to handle the weight. I had a 15.6" Lenovo that had trouble staying up as the speaker kept weighing it down and eventually it damaged a screen hinge of that laptop. The Asus ROG and a couple of HP 17.3" laptops that I also used had no problem handling the speaker's weight.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen Tennis Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Going strong for over five years!
customer_reviews.text: BIG five stars. This device has been under my laptop to keep the bottom at a ventilated incline for what feels like maybe seven years. This includes heat from my computer, the weight of my hands as I type, VERY infrequent dusting, and occasionally being roughly handled when I'm moving my laptop around. The sound quality is more than enough to satisfy a non-audiophile such as myself, and loud enough to make it uncomfortable for me to be close to my computer when it's full volume.
customer_reviews.author: IttyBitty

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: I may be old and half deaf, but this product is just to say the least "freakin amazing". After fighting to get the speaker out of the thick plastic, heat sealed package using only a razor knife and a small crowbar, I plugged it in and the computer did it's "plug and play" thing. I then opened my audio files and OMG the SOUND!! I have never heard sound like this from a computer and I have had many,many add on systems over the years. Really loud, great bass and good high notes. While I am not an audiophile and the purists can find fault with anything, the average listener, like me, can purchase and use this thing without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Wrangler 41

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised that you can't find anything like this in stores. I wanted something to enhance the sound quality of my Sony laptop. Separate small speakers--like for a desktop--are clumsy and impractical. This speaker delivers everything it promises: good sound, easy to use, good value. You won't get a booming bass or room-filling sound, but you're not paying for that, either. If you something that will bring your movies to life and enhance your music while you do your homework, this is it. One cord, to plug into your USB, and a spring-loaded clip to attach to the top of your laptop and you're ready to go. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: netshopper

customer_reviews.title: A great gift to give, a great gift to receive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for a friend in 2011. She loved them. I always wondered how they sounded....so I asked for them for my birthday and I got 'em! And oh man....THESE THINGS ROCK! The amount of quality, non-crackling sound that these speakers emit is quite impressive. Buy these, you won't be disappointed. Pros: - USB cable for easy plug-and-go use - doesn't block your laptop's webcam - sturdy carrying bag - and of course, great sound! A nice balance of treble AND bass. Turned all the way up, there is no distortion, and I can hear it all over this 17'x 36' room Cons: - laptop screen might block some of the sound
customer_reviews.author: Leland White

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone complaining about this item either has GREAT laptop speakers so by comparison these aren't an improvement, or they are looking to get the sound of a home theater system out of these little beauties. Anyway, I just received these and plugged them in and I really could not be happier. Not huge bass sound, but how could I expect that? They are very loud and worlds better, galaxies even, than my Sony Vaio speakers. I have them on the lowest volume setting and they are too loud for work so I have to turn down the volume on youtube's player. BTW I'm listening to Primus and King Crimson and it really does sound great. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: dSal

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker 9 months ago. I am using it on a 17" Mac laptop. What I like about the speakers: the cord is contained inside for storage, good sound, strong clip to attach to laptop, easy to carry because it is shaped like a tube (not bulky). What I don't like: the speakers direct the sound to left and right and not toward the laptop user & the speakers makes the screen slightly top-heavy, so the screen has to be close to 90 degrees or it will fall in the direction it is leaning toward. The best feature is the ease of use - there is only one short cord and the speakers move with the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: TinaInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from a little package!
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts about the sound quality that this would provide but rest assured that, unless you're a complete audiophile, you'll be more than happy with the output. Installation couldn't have been easier, and the only thing missing is heavy, booming bass (which I'm no fan of anyway). Digital streaming from a local classical station provides completely enjoyable listening, Pandora stations play beautifully, and I'm hearing sound effects in games that I've never heard before. So, before you spend money on a speaker system that requires its own crate to move, give this a try. I can almost guarantee you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Utah Bob

customer_reviews.title: good sound, impressive design
customer_reviews.text: If i were writing this review last week, I would have give 4 stars; good sound, impressive design, quality volume. Unfortunately this speaker let me down bug time this week, hense it is returned now. After only few weeks of use, right speaker started to give static noise, horrible horrible static noise. It is very unfortunate, because I thought I gave good money for this speaker. Again unfortunately I will have to look for another speaker ; which will be either Bose or some other brand that I have more trust on.
customer_reviews.author: Burcu

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: To all the negative reviews, you must be the competition. This is the best piece of luxury tech item I've gotten in the last year. The sound is really good and yes it's not like Bose speakers—it's not meant to be but it's a heck a lot better than the internal speakers. It's got a good round sound and great output. Sometimes I wish it could go louder but more often than not, it's quite find. If I want louder, I'll connect my computer to my tv and watch on a bigger screen. For God's sake people, it's just a wand, not a set of Infinity speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Photo guy

customer_reviews.title: great speakers on the go
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for about $70 and was able to watch a movie just fine with a friend. Youtube sound test will have sound coming til it gets down to 80hz or so. Internal laptop speakers gave up at about 130 hz. The speakers being on the left and right make for great stereo sound for laptop movie watching on the go. The slip case is great for backpacking too! I definitely would not pay $200 some for them though. $70 used was quite a price jump just for the convinence of good old stereo sound in 1 small bar.
customer_reviews.author: Great OwlTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound solution for laptops kept on laps
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly high-end gaming laptop (at least, it was high-end when I bought it two years ago.) The laptop speakers are decent, but I wanted something better to enhance game play. My laptop is just that - I don't have a desk, so it sits on my lap when I'm using it. Typical PC speakers wouldn't really work for me, so when I found this Logitech speaker, all of the positive reviews convinced me to try it. I was not disappointed. For the size and the price, the sound is excellent. The speaker clamps on securely, and it does not obscure any of the screen. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Inspiring Insomnia

customer_reviews.title: Speaker for Mac Air
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product, it made my hard to hear Mac Air into a good quality sound box. It was simple to set up, has its own plus and minus for sound and although I found that attaching it to the screen was OK, it works better away from the screen. I added a simple USB extension cord and moved it around until I was happy with the sound balance and loudness. This now means we can watch videos straight off the internet on the MacAir, which I have hooked up to a HP screen. The price was excellent, the shipping fast, and the set-up easy. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: John Edward Elsegood

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate sound for any notebook or laptop
customer_reviews.text: In the words of my daughter, "the best ever". She has an ACER laptop that has one speaker and it wasn't very loud even on the highest setting and poor quality when she watched a movie. She took the speaker out of the carrying pouch and plugged it in and the sound was amazing. On 3 it's louder then her laptop speaker on high. Better sound, with the bass to go with it. Movies and music are top notch. If you are looking for a speaker for your laptop or notebook this is the one. Look no further. Her laptop is a 15.4" and it doesn't extend past either side and allows the web cam and mic to be visible.
customer_reviews.author: Johnwv

customer_reviews.title: Big little speaker
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed after receiving the speaker is that it's much bigger than I expected. It's wider than my 10" netbook, and heavy enough to tip it over when the netbook is sitting on a level surface. On a bigger laptop it's fine, but it's still a big boy. The second thing I noticed is just how rich the sound really is. I didn't expect that level of volume and thickness from two little speakers like that. Logitech really did their research and created a nice laptop speaker. Highly recommended if you can deal with the size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: WOW, believe the good reviews!
customer_reviews.text: In all liklihood your laptop has mediocre speakers regardless of make or price. I've been using A/C powered desktop speakers with my new Toshiba to listen to music. Good sound but not very portable. I decided to buy this Logitech USB powered speaker for it's portability. The sound that comes out of this handsome little unit is fantastic for it's size and power output. I have it set at 10 percent volume and that's plenty loud enough (for me) with clear, crisp music. A USB powered, small speaker just shouldn't sound this good....BUT, it does.
customer_reviews.author: OrdinaryGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: I like these speakers but I don't love them. They do what you need them to do but I have three problems with them: 1) the speakers tend to way down my MacBook screen so it won't necessarily stay in position, 2) the speakers leave marks on the back of my laptop screen from rubbing, and 3) because the speakers face out instead of toward the viewer, sometimes the sound can be a bit lost. Sometimes I cup my hands around the speaker to redirect the sound and it's incredible how much of a difference it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Norah Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Few things you should know
customer_reviews.text: Considering how small the speaker is, that it is usb powered, and how it's tucked away nicely behind the laptop monitor, it's surprising how it has a nice full sound. What's great is that these don't take up any desk space. Sound is 10x better than my built in speakers. Does it sound better than a 5.1 dedicated home theater system ? No, but seriously for forty five bucks do you really expect it to? This basically turned my little $300 intel i3 2330m 17 inch toshiba laptop into a decent media center, where I can enjoy movies, music, and satellite tv.
customer_reviews.author: Irad

customer_reviews.title: Everything I could ask for
customer_reviews.text: Having laptop speakers that could operate from a USB port was critical for my purposes, and these deliver everything I could ask for given the price. The only time they were not loud enough was in a very crowded restaurant at lunch, and even then you could hear them if you concentrated. The ambient noise level was at least 90 db, and unless I had a PA system I don't think you could have heard anything else, either. I'm sure there are better laptop speakers out there somewhere, but for the price these are a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: William Webb

customer_reviews.title: After three years ... disappointed and will have to replace.
customer_reviews.text: Below was my original review ...I'm updating my review ... after three years of use I have lowered the rating to two stars. Why? Vibration. They didn't last and I didn't pay $449 either .. a lot less. Regardless. They have to be replaced. The sound now is irritating with heavy vibration. I am so happy I decided on this product rather than any other speakers. It takes up NO space on my desk as it affixes to the bottom of my computer screen. The volume is high and adjustable. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JungleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Terrific For Road Use
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for more than two years and carry it with me on the road when I do classroom teaching. It's great for audio clips, movies, etc. It fits my 14" laptop perfectly. My only niggling complaint is that it's heavy and, if the laptop screen has been pushed back too far with the speaker attached, the laptop will fall backwards. For those who say that they "blew" the speaker, well, my guess is that they played it at too high a volume. Any speaker will blow if over driven. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Will Corsair

customer_reviews.title: Symphonic Sound from my Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy listening to classical music, but never bothered listening on my laptop since the quality of sound was so poor. I read the reviews of this speaker and decided to spring for this one, even though it was a little pricier than others (which did not have such good reviews). I am extremely happy with mydecision, and am enjoying Mozart as I write this review. The sound is very good, with good bass, and it makes listening enjoyable. And it truly is a "plug-and-play" device. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Blythe

customer_reviews.title: Logitech USB Laptop Speaker Z305
customer_reviews.text: This speaker system exceeded my expectations soundwise. I only ordered it because I use it on a laptop that I move around a lot, and I didn't want the inconvenience of moving connected desktop PC speakers. Also, I do have some other inexpensive connected Logitech speakers that are better than any ever supplied to me by the computer OEM's. (Shame on them from day one.) Set up is simple. One caveat. I selected free ground shipping, and it took a month to get here??? Usually my Amazon ground shipments get here in a week, or less. I'll chalk that up as a "one off" unless it happens again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked for less than two years
customer_reviews.text: perhaps, in today's world when an electronic item works only two years, one should be grateful for small favors - but not when one pays $250 for it! after working beautifully, it suddenly stopped emitting sound yesterday. changing usb ports did not help. it continues to be recognized by the computer, but that's not of any help. i have a post on the logitech facebook page requesting help; hopefully that will bring results. but i want to alert others that the cost for this thing is not justified because it doesn't last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: laplane

customer_reviews.title: is it windows or is it the speaker drivers?
customer_reviews.text: When it works it is wonderful- great sound, I'm quite pleased with it. But it doesn't always work- about half the time it is awful, distorted sound. Rebooting sometimes works, sometimes it doesn't. I wish I could figure out what the conditions are that make it distorted but I can't. I haven't tried tech support- this should be easy and it should work so I don't think you should have to get tech support- it ain't rocket science. I don't use it enough to try too hard to figure it out but I might sometime.
customer_reviews.author: apteros

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker based on intended use
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for speakers to convert your laptop to a hi fi component, this isn't it. However, I was looking for a simple and portable speaker that I could get for my team for making presentations. In this case, this units works great! It fits perfectly into a standard laptop bag and is plug and play with any laptop. Also, how it hooks up to the screen is ideal because you don't need to worry about creating a bigger footprint. Finally, the sound is definitely adequate for a fair size room to play videos to a small to medium sized group.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: The sound and the easy of use is excellent
customer_reviews.text: In the last five years I conducted 700 management seminars using this Laptop Speaker. The sound and the easy of use is excellent. Many attendees commented on its size, ease of use and transporability
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was really wondering if this speakers where going to sound good seems they are so small. Well I have to say it was worth the money. They sound pretty great to be laptop speakers and the movies sounds pretty amazing. They are really loud.. And the bass is ok for what I need. For music its not the best, but for anything else is just great. I think they are a little bit over priced. They should be $40 no more than that. But over all there are pretty good speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speakers sound good.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are really good. Has two speakers mounted therein, one on each side (end). The sound quality is good. The sound of a laptop is not the same, and I know many. Installation is quick, you connect the usb and the driver installation is immediate (Win 7 took 30 sec.), not have to do anything. Information: do not wait even a high-performance speakers. These speakers are the complement perfect laptop for a small room, or for personal use. I'm satisfied with the product and its price.
customer_reviews.author: DONY

customer_reviews.title: LapTop Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had checked the reviews on this product, I am very pleased with the Speakers, installed it today(8/11)with no problems, and I am amazed at the sound that came out of this little speaker, it is like night and day compared to my Toshiba L770 speakers. they are OK for a laptop, but had to keep them at 100% to hear anything, especially when using Skype. The product was delivered very quickly from Amazon.com Thanks Guy's, Dave English
customer_reviews.author: David English

customer_reviews.title: Less is more!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker, both in terms of size and performance. Much better, louder sound than what is possible on my Mac Pro 13, plus decent bass. This is great for office presentations as well as listening to Pandora in private as the sound booms! I also think the size is perfect for travel vs. two separate portable speakers. My only wish is that there was somehow bluetooth and battery-only capabilities, which is why I gave 4 stars, but for the price, this is hard to beat. Also, having a single stereo speaker is far more easy to travel around and much more durable/resilient in a packed computer bag. The travel pouch is a nice touch, and helps protect the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetsumatra

customer_reviews.title: Great design but didn't measure up
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these speaker unit it worked great but since then I've changed my laptop to a MacBook Pro and they just don't do a good job. The main reason I got this speaker unit was because I was unhappy with the volume output on my laptop. I can barely tell any difference between my built in speaker and this plug in speaker. I have to have the volume turned up all the way and still can't hear most of the talking when I'm watching a movie from 3 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.Dee

customer_reviews.title: half working 2.5 years in
customer_reviews.text: If this item worked as it did when it was new, considering how expensive it was, it would have 5 stars from me. When working, the sound seemed "surround-like," and after one use I couldn't go back to using the built-in laptop speakers. Now that it doesn't work fully: there is a hiss that increases as bass of a song or show increases. Other nice features include the easy clip-over-screen-top-edge design and the just-long-enough USB cord.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star product when it was $50...
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a 5-star item, but that was back when it was $50 dollars. There's no way I'd pay the current $200+ price, regardless of the fact that I enjoyed using it for several years. There will come another product with the same value, and I'll buy something less expensive in the interim to replace my dead unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K.

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: It's a permanent part of my laptop now. I don't even have to mess with the settings at all. I just leave it max and leave it there. Clear, clean sound, rich-enough bass. Wonderful for my living room/kitchen area. Update on June 29th, 2019 (over 7 years since purchase). It looks like the right side of the speaker is giving distorted audio, which gets worse with higher volume. I'll leave the 5 stars as-is, since 7 years is a reasonable lifetime for this kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: Chinedu P. Opara

customer_reviews.title: A lot of boom for the buck !
customer_reviews.text: Best computer accessory I have ever purchased. I have this on my laptop where it is pretty much hidden until all that sound comes out!! I am more than impressed with it. I have mine a few inches from a wall and seems to sound more "boomy" that way. HOLY S__T !! BATMAN !! I just looked at the current price. I paid $34.99 for this in 2011. That is why I said a lot of boom for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: girlsrockurboyz

customer_reviews.title: These Laptop Speakers Rock!
customer_reviews.text: The small speakers that came with my laptop were just not good enough for song quality. I bought these laptop speakers and I am blown away by the sound quality. Even my friends are amazed at the big sound coming from these speakers. They easily clip onto your laptop's screen at the top, and just plug into a USB port and you are up and playing your music in seconds. Comes with a handy and durable case. My only complaint is I wish the USB cord was just a few inches longer. Other than that, you can't beat these speakers for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Buckshot

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!!  Well done!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the first speakers I've ordered for my MacBook. Up until now, I've been met with disappointment time and time again. But finally, someone has done it right. This device is an exercise in function and design. Even the USB cord has its perfect place when not in use. And the sound? Oh yes, the sound. AMAZING! Admittedly, it could stand to be a little louder, but the quality is rich and layered. I can finally put away my headphones and enjoy my laptop unencumbered!
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: logitech laptop speaker
customer_reviews.text: After trying many styles of laptop speakers and all being an epic fail, I thought I would give it one more attempt. While these have some flaws overall it works well. If laptop is on an non-solid surface the USB plug is too loose and falls out of the port. Also, the volume is a little tricky to adjust. However, this comes with its own sleeve and packs up in a compact tube for travel, a must for my needs. It is unobtrusive and takes up no space at all in use. It projects sound well without any feedback or echoing.
customer_reviews.author: burntblonde

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my internal laptop speakers are terrible (mainly because of design flaw that placed them underneath the laptop). I was completely surprised out how loud the sound this produced as well as the fullness of the bass. The drivers installed very easy (Win 7). The size and placement (hanging off the back of the laptop screen) were well though-out, though for low level recordings, a front-facing set of speakers might be better--but such are the recordings' problem and not the speakers. I almost picked up a spare when I saw them at Target for $19! I still might...
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't take listening to music on the tiny little laptop speaker anymore, but I don't have room to set out speakers of any significant size. The sound is soooo much better than the laptop speaker, I am very satisfied. It would be fantastic if there were a bit more bass, but I don't think that's realistic given that I was not willing to have a larger speaker system. Completely unobtrusive where it is attached to the back of the laptop, and sound that is a real improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Taylor

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: O-M-G. These little speakers are just awesome! I just plugged them in and pressed play... Within the first 5 seconds of the song I was blown away. GREAT sounding speakers. SO much better than my tinny sounding laptop speakers. I can actually enjoy music from my laptop now. Also, I had recently purchased Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205 for my husband's work laptop. I used it a little bit before giving it to him and I was not overly impressed. The Logitech USB Laptop Speaker Z305 sounds so much better and for the price, I'd absolutely buy the Z305s again before buying the Z205s.
customer_reviews.author: D. May

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product But Remove USB Before Powering Off
customer_reviews.text: Turn your computer into a fabulous music player with just your USB port. This device sounds so good. It's a lightweight, portable sound bar that comes with its own fabric carrying cover. It's roughly 12 inches long by 1.5 inches wide. But, there are no drivers. If you leave it plugged into your USB port while your are logging off and powering off, you may get a blue screen when powering back on. Be sure to remove the device from the computer's USB port before powering off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars - but not at the current price!
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers have said, this speaker has gone up 6-7x in price since I bought it for $38 on Amazon in April, 2012. Granted it's a great little speaker - it always works, has the potential to be *very* loud without distortion, super light... but it's worth $38. I love the speaker, and came back to buy another one as a gift... but this is straight-up price gouging. Please don't fall for it, you guys.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bracewell

customer_reviews.title: You gotta be kidding...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this awesome speaker!!! I've tried so many of different brands, different sizes, none of them are as beautifully designed for the quality of sound and convenience as this one. You will forget that it's not an actual part of your laptop. The moment you slip it on it, the laptop and the speaker become complete.... ...I'm listening 80's as I write and I can hear an echo and a bass, which you won't hear with any speakers that are as small as this one. I'm truly amazed, impressed, and blown away. thank you..
customer_reviews.author: Lena L

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these speakers for about a year and a half, and they're still going strong. The output is amazing for their compact size, and they are well designed. I initially bought them for a Windows laptop, and they're now on my MacBook Pro (fyi, you have to go to settings and change the output to the speakers for them to work on macs). Logitech is a good brand, but these speakers have been used daily and have held up nicely. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop speaker with high hopes.. and I wasn't let down. This speaker is great! Amazing sound quality, it's loud, and the sound is well balanced. I would buy it again and again. It comes with a good storage bag with a draw string and the usb cable tucks nicely into the speaker. It has power and vol up/down buttons as well as a green power LED light. The only con is that it's a little on the heavy side but it still functions great. Thanks Logitech for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Laptop Speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these speakers extensively and they dramatically help the sound of my crappy mono audio laptop speakers. I wish they were just a bit louder but this satisfies most of my requirements, I looked at many options and this seemed like the best value I could find. I paid $40 (forty dollars) for these from Amazon on 3/15/2012. That was a fair price, I'd be happy with as much as $50 but for much more than that I'd look around and see what all the options were.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases on Amazon or otherwise. The sound quality is unbelievable for something that has a USB port and is this lightweight. It is a permanent fixture on my laptop and can be carried around easily as it fits well at the top of the screen. It is too heavy for my 13.5" Mac Air, but I use it anyway. You have to be careful with adjusting the monitor angle just right so that it holds the weight especially with sleeker/lightweight laptop models. The sound is great and it is hard to listen to the regular laptop speakers once you get used to this. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound boost
customer_reviews.text: I use my laptop to watch movies occasionally. When I'm doing the dishes and watching a show, I can't hear my laptop speakers over the clanking dishes. I acquired one of these, and man, it fills the room. No disappointment. For how big they are, and how little power they are receiving, these things are marvels. Clip attaches to the top of the laptop quite nicely. Convenient place to store chord. Easy setup on my mac. These speakers = winning.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Laptop Speaker for the Mac Book Pro!
customer_reviews.text: My new Mac Book Pro never seemed loud enough and I kept thinking there was something wrong with the built-in speakers but found out that the low volume was consistent with other Mac Books...therefore I knew I had to find a portable external speaker that I could easily transport along with my computer. I found it in this Logitech Laptop Speaker! It fits perfectly on my 15" computer screen and makes my little laptop sound like a high-end portable sound system! I actually love this speaker so much, I've bought it for two friends of mine (as birthday gifts)! They love their new speaker as well!!
customer_reviews.author: mikee320

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with Windows 10 This speaker is good before. But with latest Windows 10 Update it has serious problems. The volume always going to zero. it mean we can Not use this speaker with windows 10. and Logitech did not provide Driver to solve the problems
customer_reviews.author: Utomo P. Widjaja

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is great, sounds good. Only issue is that it has to be removed to close my laptop, but that is a minor issue to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brockman

customer_reviews.title: What a difference this speaker makes!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dell Vostro laptop, which has less than stellar quality speakers. I didn't know what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised with this speaker. The positives: -Simple sleek design that can attach to the screen or be next to your laptop (it can be a little heavy). -No additional software is needed -Just plug in and play. -The operation features are very simple to use. -It provides a rich, quality sound when playing music. -Reasonable price -It's a great product for home use.
customer_reviews.author: RNS

customer_reviews.title: Take this on travel
customer_reviews.text: I fly all over the country. I stuff this little speaker in my backpack and use it in the hotel. I've been using this for months, and it is too loud to turn up all the way. It's fidelity is great for what you are using it for. For the home, a good stereo or better computer speaker system, but for travel this thing is loud and sounds really great, and it's very easy, light, and convenient to transport anywhere. No external power source needed, either.
customer_reviews.author: Hippy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, good sound, convenient size
customer_reviews.text: Just received the second purchase of this item for my husband's laptop. It puts out good quality sound and has plenty of power. No problems to set up, it just plugs into the USB and it works. I've found it best to go into Control Panel and select this speaker as the default, since I leave it on my laptop full time. The original speakers on this computer were rather weak, low volume, so I am happy to have something to use with my Pandora subscription while I'm working.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Malone-Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: this Logitech usb speaer works great.
customer_reviews.text: I am joining the crowd that gives this Logitech USB speaker high marks. It is perfect for either desk top operation or as a portable for my laptop. I should have discovered this item long before now as it fills a need that has not been available prior to this time for me. I would not be without this wonderful speaker that gives so much sound considering only a USB hookup. I used it as sound for a projected lecture last night and everyone in the room could hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Maynard M. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Took My Netbook To The Next level
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech USP Laptop Speaker Z305 helped cure one of the problems of netbooks-- inferior sound from sub par built in speakers. With the Z305, listening to music via Pandora or watching videos was no longer an unpleasant thought. The sound was big and bold and actually rivaled the sound that I got from the harmon kardon built in speakers on my laptop. It was truly plug and play with the USB interface and worked right out of the box. Best investment you can make for your netbook...
customer_reviews.author: Z Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound great, huge difference compared to the speakers in my laptop (there are some videos in youtube that show the difference). I don't think I'll be carrying this around much but the sleeve it comes with not only makes it portable but it also protects the speakers quite well. Its sound is also great for others to hear, since it fills up the whole room. It's light and it attaches really well to your laptop screen, another good thing I noticed is that the clip is wide enough to not obstruct the camera and mic.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine...for a while.
customer_reviews.text: This little laptop "sound-bar" worked pretty good for a while. The sound was clear and fairly loud. It made watching videos or listening to music on the laptop more enjoyable. It wasn't too heavy or cumbersome. Unfortunately, the one I purchased crapped out after about 3 months or so. One of the speakers had an audible air or "hissing" type sound coming out of it along with the regular sound output. I ended up just tossing it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Damn Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is pretty damn good. Compared to the laptop sound it is a HUGE improvement. My husband can hear movies without having to put his headset on. It's not the best speakers compared to other well known brands that are built to work for certain types of sound. But for the price I would say this is a good deal and you wont have to worry about leaning forward to hear anything from your laptop again.. Very impressive and I recommend to all. I even bought one for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Linette Pope

customer_reviews.title: Wicked sound for laptops
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves to watch Netfix and Hulu while watching dishes. However, her new HP laptop's speakers are pathetic. It's really hard to hear anything from them while working. I got her this speaker setup because I thought it would give her speakers some more 'umph'. Wow, was I surprised when I tried out this thing. It provides really outstanding sound for its size. Pretty solid bass and definitely much better treble (and volume) than any laptop could provide. My Thinkpad has pretty decent volume to to (she used this before having her own laptop) but this thing even blows the thinkpad out of the water. Just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - I purchased a new laptop that had very small and under powered speakers. In order to hear music and videos I had to be in a very quiet room, if not - it was impossible to hear anything. I bought the Logitech Z305 USB speakers and attached them to the laptop, WOW!! What great sounds. Basically, I went from horrible to great sound. Now I can't wait to plug in the speakers and enjoy the groove;-p They are also very portable and self-contained, even coming with a carry bag. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NorCalAl

customer_reviews.title: Gift WIN
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of volume, excellent sound, quality materials, quality build. I am listening to Bach's Goldberg Variations and can hear (faintly) at the other end of my house. With my classical material, I was not able to drive it to distortion. It almost tipped my Asus netbook over, but I simply adjusted the screen angle. My college student is thrilled, though I doubt she will listen to Bach. And it won't be tippy at all on her larger laptop.
customer_reviews.author: harry miley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these speakers because I wanted something I could carry in my Laptop case and could give me better sound than my on-board laptop speakers. These speakers fulfill that requirement. I am able to turn the volume up to a pretty good level, with a reasonably good sound, and they are easy to put on or take off the laptop. You can even play an MP3 player through them, if you have a USB-to-AC power adapter. However, if you are looking for room-filling sound with good bass, they will not equal a set of good amplified desk-top speakers. For my requirements, I am very happy with them. They are a quality set of speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kahn Chaddock

customer_reviews.title: Best speakers that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I never realized what I was missing by listening to my laptop speakers. I listen to a lot of mp3's. videos and movies and these speakers is what I needed. To install all I did was plug into the USB and within a minute it was installed and playing. I am 72 years old and the volume is more then loud enough. The sound is really soft and comfortable to listen to. I would recommend this product to anyone in the market for speakers for their laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Plowman

customer_reviews.title: Cant go Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews, good ones as well as bad. Honestly you can't go wrong. Really don't quite understand anyone giving this a bad review. Seriously large difference between laptop speakers and the Logitech Z305. Noticeably better with the Z305's. Tested sound quality between watching movies and playing music, and there is a HUGE difference. No driver needed, after plugging in the usb, took 15 seconds for the speaker to start working.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Minimal $ for Really Functional Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for several months now. I had wanted something that would be easy to have around (not having to hang on the side(s) of the laptop), a step up from the bad built-in speakers of my ASUS laptop, easily portable, and reasonable cost. Was not expecting actual "separate system" sound - just better and easily heard. This fit all my criteria really nicely and it even came with its own carrying case. Very nice for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: miaki

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected at all!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed when I got this speakers. I read a lot of reviews and I was hoping to get a higher audio. The quality is good and improved from the laptop (Acer 7741), but it is very low. But the worst thin is after 5 days working, one speaker started a noise and two days latter I had to removed them from the computer because it was unbearable. I couldn't return them because I am overseases. Pretty sad to through away my money. I whish you a better luck with this speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Miamian

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these speakers at the beginning of May, so I have over 6 months of experience with them and they are great! They are very stream-line and the USB cable that came with it is the perfect length for my laptop. Only problem is the padding on the clips which hold the speakers on the laptop are starting to pull away from the plastic due to the weight of the speakers. I'm hoping they don't come all the way off.
customer_reviews.author: L. Utterly

customer_reviews.title: purchased 3 years ago for only $51.75
customer_reviews.text: This is insane. I purchased the z305 three years ago in 2010 for my then girlfriend, now wife. It was only $51.75 then and now it it listed at $249.00 on Amazon and $300 on ebay???? It is a great little laptop speaker but the cord was too short and no way is it anywhere near worth $250, I can only guess it is no longer in production, but still this is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In a word, SWEEET.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a reviewer, but I had to cash in my .02 on this one. Laptop speakers are garbage, with no exception I've ever seen. These babies make viewing a movie on a 15" screen 1000% better. It's still a 15" screen, and it ain't fill-your-room sound. Duh. But for the money, size, portability, and ease of use, this product rocks. I'm looking forward to seeing the 'test of time' results, but for now: Satisfied Customer.
customer_reviews.author: A Piatt

customer_reviews.title: Works well ...
customer_reviews.text: The speaker snaps on to the top of my laptop perfectly, and I found the cord to be the perfect length to plug into a side usb port. In fact, I had enough length to be able to tuck it neatly under the laptop, so it doesn't look like an eye sore. My only wish is that I could enable "both" the laptop, and Logitech speakers to work at the same time. I have to select a default. There isn't an option for using both :-( I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it !, Defective product and dishonest Custumer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought item trough Amazon and after 2 wks of use I notice sound distortion. Amazon refund me but then I bought it back from E Bay. Product have same problem. This time I contacted directly LOGITECH Customer Service: After 18 e mails back and forth and speaking directly to 3 rep and "managers", they came to the conclusion that they can not replace product. Last Rep told me "this item has been discontinue"(It is defective, of course) So my experience was not a good one
customer_reviews.author: Armando Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected sound, economical, easy to insntall
customer_reviews.text: The sound is full with great range from highs to bass. Could not be easier to install. It did not work until the program (i-tunes) was re-started, as per instructions. My laptop immediately recognized it. I was hoping mt laptop speakers would continue to play sound (I have an HP entertaiment/gaming computer), but they shut off. In spite of this, the sound was remarkably improved and for the first time I can play music at less than 50 % of the volume and with greater clarity. The USB connector and wire fit snuggly in a slot and it has a nice pouch, so it is very portable
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love to play music as I work on my computer and as I work around the house. This speaker was installed in less than two minutes, and has excellent sound considering what I paid for it. It's great for YouTube and downloaded movies. I liked it so much that I bought one for each of my two of my kids. It's great for travelers because it comes off in seconds, can be stored and placed in a briefcase. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: IMA

customer_reviews.title: Sound bar for your notebook
customer_reviews.text: My notebook came with a speaker system called beats, I was hoping for better sound built in but was disapointed with the results bought headphones but after long term use they hurt my ears, saw the Logitech soundbar opted for a bigger speaker and the sound is pretty good plus they worked seamleesly with the computer. Movies almost sound that they are played in surround sound. My friends and family have heard the speakers and purchased them for their notebooks
customer_reviews.author: Craig Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Retiring the B-Word sub-woofer!
customer_reviews.text: For the price - and ridiculously low profile - this is the best commercial computer speaker I've heard. Not 'best clip-on' or 'best portable.' It's easily as good as my Bose system with the woofer, and I don't need a suitcase to haul it around. It even simulates surround sound, which I wasn't expecting (startled me a bit!). Love this so much, I'm getting another for my office and it's going to be my go-to stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to listen to podcasts on my netbook, but the volume on max wasn't enough to hear over my sewing machine. I thought I would give this a try. It couldn't have been easier - just plugged it into the USB on my netbook and immediately I had clear sound, and it wasn't even on max volume. It clipped on easily and didn't tip over the small netbook. With the cord path to wrap it up neatly and bag it's a well thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: pammap

customer_reviews.title: Super nice speaker for your laptop
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker (Logitech USB Laptop Speaker Z305) for my Mac to amp up the sound during movies ... and just love it. It attaches super easily, has great sound, easy-access on/off, and volume controls on the speaker which are readily accessible while it's on the pc. Highly recommend. Please note that I purchased this in 2011 when the price was $39.99 (just noticed Dec 29, 2012 price is now over $100!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Weinhaus

customer_reviews.title: I use it every single day and I could not be more pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker in 2010. I travel constantly for work and am not always the most gentle of my electronics so it has seen some serious wear and tear. I use it every single day and I could not be more pleased with the quality, sound and longevity / sturdiness as a portable speaker. I will say that the cord is a bit short, and the speaker itself a tad heavy (causing my laptop to be unsteady in the wrong position; however, these aspects do not deter from what I find to be an overall exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brandon

customer_reviews.title: on 1st use this speakers beat the laptop speakers any ...
customer_reviews.text: on 1st use this speakers beat the laptop speakers any time. even beat those 2 speaker syst. after long use, the sound gets tiring. yet after years of usage, my RHS speaker has start to give crackling sound even at mid levels vol. i guess the speaker has cracked somewhere. perhaps its due for change.
customer_reviews.author: roseazam

customer_reviews.title: Speaker worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the logitech laptop speaker about 2 months ago. I thought the sound from my Toshiba laptop was kind of whimmpy even when turned up as loud as possible. I do have a hearing problem.But the logitech speaker makes all the difference in the world. I can only turn it up about a quarter of the way on the scale or my wife claims its too loud. It makes speach much clearer and louder for me.I think it was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Grover C. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Well Done
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for this clever device, zero stars for packaging. Had to use metal shears to free it from its hard plastic prison. Once out, it proved to be as advertised. Sets up in two minutes (true plug and play with Win 7). Very good sound for such a compact speaker system, and as noted elsewhere it is LOUD. I find that that a volume setting of two or three is plenty for most applications. I am using it as speaker for my Dell desktop, clipped to the top of the 21.5" monitor.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Broome

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great - a bit short for larger laptops.
customer_reviews.text: This sounds great, especially for the price. It's just slightly shorter than my 13.3" laptop cover is wide, so those with larger laptops may not get the full experience of the speakers since the screen would block some of the sound. The true benefit of these is having the audio source closer in height to your ears. The sound is fired to the left and right, with wide enough angles to let you hear clearly, which beats having smaller speakers coming from the laptop, and fired towards the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - cord a little short
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked great right out of the box. It's plug and play, no software required. The sound is a big improvement on the built in laptop speakers. Possible downside for 17" laptops: the cord is a little short if your USB ports are near the front of the laptop; you may have to slide this unit to one side to reach. The volume buttons work by changing the setting on the main laptop volume slider control.
customer_reviews.author: Caelo

customer_reviews.title: A must have for laptop owners.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my Acer 17" screen laptop as I watch streaming movies in bed. My wife tried it out one day on her laptop when cooking and she claimed it, so I purchased another. Great for those business trips for movies and music. The lead could be a little longer, but I would recommend to anyone. Great sound at all levels, easy to set up and stores nicely away in the bag it comes with. 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Keith S-B

customer_reviews.title: A throw away speaker.
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT!! For eight months it was amazing. The price was a bit much, but the clairty was fanulous. The office was filled with clean crisp music. Then it just stopped. Nothing. Green light on. Light static from speakers. USB recognizes it. No conflicts. No drivers needed. Yes, I can go through the hassle of calling customer service at Logitech, and i have a claim in, but seriously?!? For this price, I would expect more than a Walmart length of time in productive use!
customer_reviews.author: Dellaripa

customer_reviews.title: A Clever Way To Do It
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever little gadget which works better than I had expected. In fact it plays so well that I just ordered another one for my wife's computer. It's plenty loud enough for me and the mid-range is so clear that you get presence with vocals, and there's even some base response! At $40 it seems a little pricey, but if it's half as durable as the blister pack it came in, it should last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have unbelievable sound. They are way better than my cheap laptop speakers and it even comes with its own carrying case. You just plug them in and they work great- no annoying software to install. The ONLY problem I have is that the usb cable is a bit too short to reach the usb ports which are on the side of my computer (but close to the front). I only gave this 4 stars because now I have to order a usb extension cable. If you have a usb port near the rear half of your computer then this is easily a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Huoi

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected, despite the good reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a number of portable speakers over the last several years, and despite the already great reviews overall, I was still incredibly surprised by the sound quality vs price! For ~$30 you really can't go wrong, unless you're looking for a sound system from your laptop to host a large party, this will more than meet most peoples needs to play some tunes while doing work or shuffling around the room. Can even fill a medium sized room for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen

customer_reviews.title: Good Highs, Mids, OK Bass
customer_reviews.text: Long story short: Good Highs Good High-Mids Good Mids OK Low-Mids Weak Lows --Still 3x better than stock Altec Lansing laptop speakers Seen good reviews of the Edifier USA Sound Bar, may try it next. Here is a link.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Totally GREAT Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My laptop built-in speakers are totally inadequate, so based on customer reviews for this speaker, I purchased it for my computer. "Easy" to install is just that - even I could do it! Clip the speaker to the top of the screen, plug the USB into a port on your computer, and listen! Speaker quality is terrific, a great range for loudness, and the sound is extremely clear. It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker bar based on the reviews read here and I was not disappointed. It was ready to use when it came out of the packaging and the sound it emits is incredible. My laptop has terrible speakers which emit a very tinny, cheap sound. The sound from this speaker bar does not equal my stereo's speakers, of course, but it does an excellent job. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: janets98

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, really high quality sound that is fills the room
customer_reviews.text: These are really amazing and way better than I expected since they are so inexpensive. I have the previous gen model and these new ones are way better. The sound quality is really high res and they fill the entire room, and are really loud. They really are surround sound. They are totally worth the price and hook easily to my computer and monitor. I highly recommend them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: not bad at all...
customer_reviews.text: A while back the speakers in my wife's laptop stopped working so we needed a small, portable solution. This Logitech works great and has a decent sound for what it is. Much better than the laptops speakers. It was a toss up between these and the Phillips. I like the fact that it hangs off the back and has volume control. I guess my only gripe is I thought they would be louder, but after messing around with some settings, any louder than how the default is will make the audio distorted and damage the speakers. Its already plenty loud enough as it is... but can't handle being turned to "11"...
customer_reviews.author: rusty_trojan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new laptop (not from Amazon) and the speakers were terrible. So I checked-out the reviews on Amazon and bought this Logitech speaker. I can't believe how great they are. It's a sound bar that easily clips to the laptop and is even designed not to interfere with the webcam. If your laptop speakers are as bad as mine try this product. What a difference it makes!
customer_reviews.author: Larry S

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good sound
customer_reviews.text: As a long time music lover I have auditioned countless audio products. I can honestly say these speakers provide an excellent rendition of mids and highs that I never expected in such a small unit. My laptop never sounded so good. Add to that the convenience of being powered by USB and this is the must have portable audio accessory for any laptop at any price.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The speakers on my MacBook went bad and way too costly to repair so I opted to buy these speakers and am so glad I did. They work great and sound much better than the original speakers in my MacBook. I only gave it a 4 star and not 5 because you do have to attach it to your computer, but it is very easy to do so, easy set-up and really works and sounds wonderful. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy O

product_meta.title: Logitech Z305 Clip-On USB Laptop Speaker
product_meta.description: Room-filling 360 sound; speaker projects sound in all directionsPlug-and-playSimple portable clip-on design attaches securely to most laptops and booksUSB cable tucks neatly into the back of the speakerStandard 3.5mm stereo jack12 3/4" W x 1 5/8" H x 1 1/2" DPC and Mac patibleIncludes travel case
feature_bullets: 360-degree sound gives you a balanced and immersive listening experience all around the room
One simple USB connection for power and pure digital audio - no power cord needed
Clip-on design and travel case make it easy to take your speaker anywhere you use your laptop
Built-in USB cable storage keeps the cable neatly tucked away when you're not using it
Works with Windows and Mac OS laptops and netbooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars940 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
